about_the_game:
From the creator of the indie hidden gems Nimian Legends: BrightRidge and Wilderless comes Wilderless: Meadowfell, a cozy open-world game crafted for those who love to unwind and explore at their own pace. This is a serene, untamed wilderness designed for relaxation and creativity, perfect for players who enjoy non-violent games, exploration, and cozy escapes.

A VIVID, UNTAMED WORLD TO EXPLORE

• Explore a serene, pastoral landscape filled with gentle rivers, peaceful lakes, rolling hills, and lush forests.

• Experience dynamic weather and a day-night cycle that makes every journey feel alive and unique.

• Wander through a natural landscape that feels full of charm and personality, filled with the messy, untamed beauty of real wilderness with dust, light, and natural imperfections bringing it to life.

NO ENEMIES, NO QUESTS, JUST PURE RELAXATION

• With no enemies and no quests, Meadowfell is about exploration and taking in the beauty around you.

• Explore at your own pace, free from the pressures of combat or missions.

• Perfect for cozy gamers and families who enjoy calm, peaceful experiences.

A COZY, CALMING ESCAPE

• Whether you’re hiking through rolling hills, flying as a hawk over majestic cliffs, or swimming in crystal-clear lakes, Meadowfell is all about savoring the moment.

• Immerse yourself in a world designed for quiet moments and peaceful discovery.

IMMERSIVE PHOTO MODE

• Capture beautiful moments in nature whenever you like.

• Adjust the time of day, field of view, and depth of field for the perfect shot.

• Share your serene landscapes and moments of stillness with friends and other players.

CREATE YOUR OWN GARDENS

• Build peaceful gardens by manually placing plants, trees, benches, and stone ruins.

• Design your own peaceful spaces anywhere in the world and make the environment your own.

PREMIUM EXPERIENCE, NO INTERRUPTIONS

• No ads, no microtransactions, and no hidden fees—just a complete gaming experience.

• Play offline with no data collection and enjoy a distraction-free escape into nature.

• Optimize your gameplay with extensive quality settings and benchmarking options, allowing you to tailor the experience to your preferences.

PERFECT FOR NATURE LOVERS AND FAMILIES

• Parents love playing Meadowfell with their kids, offering a family-friendly experience that’s rich in natural beauty and curiosity.

• Ideal for gamers who seek relaxation, cozy experiences, and non-violent gameplay.

HANDCRAFTED BY A SOLO DEVELOPER, A TRUE LABOUR OF LOVE

• Wilderless: Meadowfell is a passion project, lovingly created by a solo indie developer who is deeply committed to crafting peaceful, nature-inspired worlds.

• Every detail reflects a love for relaxing, delightful gameplay, and outdoor beauty, designed with input from the community.

Share the Adventure

 Feel free to share footage of Wilderless: Meadowfell on YouTube or other platforms. Retweets, shares, and reposts are also greatly appreciated and help others discover the peaceful world of Meadowfell.
